name: Project Holzbrenn PROTOTYPE
description:
Nothing in this game is finished yet, this release is only intended to show off the core gameplay mechanics of healing and NPC's fighting each other.

First public prototype of the top-down wave-based heal-'em-up made under the working title of Project Holzbrenn! Your allies, the Holzbrenners, will fight the Ordorians. You can't fight yourself, so you'll need to rely on your abilities as a medic to keep the halberdiers of Holzbrenn upright and defend you.
